title: Overcharge protection in aqueous zinc-ion batteries via self-sacrificial additives
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01759E, Paper
Shuo Yang, Liang Mei, Zhuoxi Wu, Jiaxiong Zhu, Pei Li, Hu Hong, Zhiyuan Zeng, Hongfei Li, Funian Mo, Chunyi Zhi
This research investigated the behavior of zinc-ion batteries during overcharging and electrolyte decomposition was identified as a primary cause of battery failure. Self-sacrificial electrolytes were developed to provide overcharge protection.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
